question: Nastoreen statement - What is your opinion?
answer:
QUESTION
I refer to the Nastoreen statement by someone claiming to be the seal capacity of Imam Al-Hussain the Progenitor and Elijah (Elias) the Prophet (PBUH) before him. The Nastoreen statement is highly detailed. I would like to ask you if you have read this and whether or not you endorse any part of it. If so, how can this person have the knowledge of so much. In particular, chapter 11 - This is an account of a visit from the people of the Kingdom of Atlantis.
ANSWER


Share:
The beliefs of Nastoreen is incorrect and baseless.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

By Mufti Ebrahim Desai
